actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 101(7) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, so as to include flight attendants within the definition of "airman."

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to include flight attendants within the definition of "airman" under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 101(7) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, so as to include flight attendants within the definition of "airman."
